sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"组成，构成"之意。
means: compose ： 正式用词，多用被动态。指将两个或两个以上的人或物放到一起形成一个整体。
comprise ： 正式用词，指整体是由几个独立的部分所组成。
consist与of连用，指一个整体由几个部分组成，或由某些材料构成。
constitute ： 正式用词，指由某些部分组成一个整体或构成某物的基本成分。在句中，主语表事物的组成部分，宾语表示事物的整体。

sentence.Network_en: The division will consist of two tank companies and one infantry company.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个师的组成部队将包括两个坦克连和一个步兵连。

sentence.Network_en: A healthy diet should consist of wholefood.
sentence.Network_cn: 健康饮食应由全天然食物构成。

sentence.Network_en: The development will consist of 66 dwellings and a number of offices.
sentence.Network_cn: 新建楼区将由66栋住房和一些办公用房组成。

润滑脂_百度百科 ... 1. 时效硬化（ Age Hardening） 4. 稠度（consistency）（ Consistency） 5. 可分配性（ Dispensability）.
SIP transaction consists of a SIP request and the appropriate response ., 一次 sip 交易包括一个 sip 请求和适当的应答.
关于一致（consistent）的定义容易混淆，而且 GET DB CFG 命令的报告方式也常常会引起问题。 按照定义，对于一个数据库，如果 …
高二英语必修五单词列表_百度文库 ... tense n. 时态 consistent adj. 一致的 Unit 3 aspect n. 方面.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'be located or inherent in'): from Latin consistere 'stand firm or still, exist', from con- 'together' + sistere 'stand (still')

entry.def: Something that consists of particular things or people is formed from them.

example.ex: Breakfast consisted of porridge served with butter.
example.tran: 早餐是麦片粥配佐餐黄油。

example.ex: Her crew consisted of children from Devon and Cornwall.
example.tran: 她的团队由来自德文郡和康沃尔郡的孩子们组成。

entry.def: Something that consists in something else has that thing as its main or only part.

example.ex: His work as a consultant consisted in advising foreign companies on the siting of new factories.
example.tran: 作为一名顾问，他的工作是为外国公司在新厂选址问题上提供建议。

example.ex: ...Baudelaire's idea that genius consists in the ability to summon up childhood.
example.tran: 波德莱尔认为天才在于唤起童年的能力的观点

sentences.sentence: "The problems dwell in the social injustices in this country"

means.word_mean: 2. have its essential character; be comprised or contained in; be embodied in;
3. be consistent in form, tenor, or character; be congruous;

sentences.sentence: "Desires are to be satisfied only so far as consists with an approved end"
"The land he conquered comprised several provinces"

auth_sentence.content: Major international competitions consist of qualification and final rounds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Major international competitions consist of qualification and final rounds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Major international competitions consist of qualification and final rounds.

auth_sentence.content: Their diets consist mainly of fish and small mammals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their diets consist mainly of fish and small mammals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their diets consist mainly of fish and small mammals.

auth_sentence.content: They consist of an extremely large and scary group.
auth_sentence.res_content: They consist of an extremely large and scary group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They consist of an extremely large and scary group.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

Sentence.sentence: Its teaching staff consists of women only.
Each group consisted of around 120 adults of similar age and education, and the test assessed their language skills.

means.word_mean: 由…组成，构成；包括，包含(常与 of连用)

sentences.en: The entire world consists of matter.
sentences.cn: 整个世界都是由物质组成的。

means.word_mean: 存在于，在于；表现为(常与 in 连用)

sentences.en: The spirit consists in whole-hearted devotion to public interests.
sentences.cn: 这种精神就是一心为公。

sentences.en: Health does not consist with intemperance.
sentences.cn: 健康和饮酒无度是不能并存的。

means.word_mean: 符合，一致；并存；(常与with连用)

sentences.en: Our deeds must consist with our words.

jushi.english: Learning and personality do not always consist together.
jushi.chinese: 学问与人格并不总是相一致的。
